articles.author: HT News Desk
articles.title: British PM Starmer announces four-step plan to defend Ukraine, says ‘time to act, not talk’ - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Keir Starmer said key steps agreed upon at the European leaders' summit aimed to support Ukraine and strengthen its security. | World News
articles.content:
British Prime Minister Keir Starmer on Sunday said European nations stand at a crossroads in history and must realise that it is time to act, following a defence summit on Ukraine.
(L to R) Volodymy… [+2340 chars]
